name: DeletePVar
notes: Once a variable is deleted, attempts to retrieve the value will return 0 (for integers and floats and NULL for strings.
description: Deletes a previously set player variable.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player variable to delete.

params_body.name: varname
params_body.description: The name of the player variable to delete.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. Either the player specified isn't connected or there is no variable set with the given name.
related_fn:
SetPVarInt: Set an integer for a player variable.
 GetPVarInt: Get the previously set integer from a player variable.
 SetPVarString: Set a string for a player variable.
 GetPVarString: Get the previously set string from a player variable.
 SetPVarFloat: Set a float for a player variable.
 GetPVarFloat: Get the previously set float from a player variable.
